unified_fields.name: article_id
unified_fields.description: Unique identifier for the article/publication record
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Primary key uniquely identifying a scholarly work within the source system

unified_fields.name: doi
unified_fields.description: Digital Object Identifier for the publication
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Persistent identifier providing a unique URL for scholarly content

unified_fields.name: pmid
unified_fields.semantic_definition: NCBI-assigned unique identifier for articles indexed in PubMed

unified_fields.name: pmcid
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Identifier for full-text articles archived in PubMed Central

unified_fields.name: title
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Primary title of the scholarly work

unified_fields.name: abstract
unified_fields.description: Abstract or summary of the article
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Concise summary of the research content and findings

unified_fields.name: authors
unified_fields.description: List of authors who contributed to the work
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Ordered list of individuals who authored the scholarly work

unified_fields.name: author_orcid
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Open Researcher and Contributor ID uniquely identifying an author

unified_fields.name: affiliations
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Research institutions or organizations associated with authors
example_values: Department of Biology, Harvard University, Cambridge, MA, USA

unified_fields.name: publication_date
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Date when the work was formally published or made available

unified_fields.name: publication_year
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Calendar year when the work was published

unified_fields.name: journal_title
unified_fields.description: Name of the journal or publication venue
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Title of the periodical or venue where the work appeared

unified_fields.name: issn
unified_fields.description: International Standard Serial Number for the journal
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique identifier for serial publications (print or electronic)

unified_fields.name: volume
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Sequential volume number of the journal issue

unified_fields.name: issue
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Issue number within the volume

unified_fields.name: pages
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Start and end pages of the article in the journal

unified_fields.name: language
unified_fields.semantic_definition: ISO language code indicating the publication language

unified_fields.name: publication_type
unified_fields.description: Type or category of the publication
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Classification of the work (journal article, review, meta-analysis, etc.)

unified_fields.name: mesh_terms
unified_fields.semantic_definition: NLM controlled vocabulary terms assigned by indexers

unified_fields.name: keywords
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Key terms describing the content of the work

unified_fields.name: citations
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Count or list of works that cite this publication

unified_fields.name: references
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Bibliography of sources cited within the publication

unified_fields.name: is_open_access
unified_fields.description: Whether the article is openly accessible
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Indicates if full text is freely available without subscription

unified_fields.name: open_access_status
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Classification of OA type (gold, green, hybrid, bronze)

unified_fields.name: full_text_url
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Direct URL to access the full text of the article

unified_fields.name: license
unified_fields.semantic_definition: License governing use and redistribution of the content

unified_fields.name: concepts
unified_fields.description: Topic concepts or fields of study
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Subject areas and topics associated with the work

unified_fields.name: grant_information
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Information about funding sources supporting the research

PubMed.name: citation_status
PubMed.description: MEDLINE indexing status (MEDLINE, PubMed-not-MEDLINE, In-Process, Publisher, Preprint)

PubMed.name: structured_abstract
PubMed.description: Abstract with labeled sections (BACKGROUND, METHODS, RESULTS, CONCLUSIONS)

PubMed.name: publication_history
PubMed.description: Dates for received, accepted, pubmed, medline, entrez

PubMed Central (PMC).name: article_sections
PubMed Central (PMC).description: Structured body sections (Introduction, Results, Methods, etc.)

PubMed Central (PMC).name: figures
PubMed Central (PMC).description: Figure elements with label, caption, and graphic href

Europe PMC.name: source_type
Europe PMC.description: Source code (MED, PMC, PAT, AGR, PPR, ETH, CBA)

Europe PMC.name: annotations
Europe PMC.description: SciLite annotations (Gene_Proteins, Diseases, Chemicals, Organisms, GO_Terms, Accession_Numbers)

OpenAlex.name: is_paratext
OpenAlex.description: Whether content is paratext (front matter, etc.)

OpenAlex.name: institution_ror
OpenAlex.description: Research Organization Registry ID for institutions

OpenAlex.name: author_position
OpenAlex.description: Position in author list (first, middle, last)

Semantic Scholar.name: s2_fields_of_study
Semantic Scholar.description: Semantic Scholar classified fields with source

unified_fields.name: entity_id
unified_fields.description: Unique identifier for the knowledge base entity
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Primary key uniquely identifying an entity or article in the knowledge base

unified_fields.name: name
unified_fields.description: Primary name or title of the entity
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Human-readable name of the entity in the preferred language

unified_fields.name: description
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Short explanatory text describing the entity

unified_fields.name: wikidata_qid
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique Q-number linking Wikipedia articles to Wikidata items

unified_fields.name: external_urls
unified_fields.semantic_definition: URLs pointing to related external resources

unified_fields.name: categories
unified_fields.description: Categories or classes the entity belongs to
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Hierarchical classification of the entity

unified_fields.name: last_modified
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Date and time when the entity was last updated

unified_fields.name: source_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: The original identifier submitted for cross-reference mapping

unified_fields.name: source_database
unified_fields.description: Database the source identifier belongs to
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Name of the database system for the input identifier

unified_fields.name: target_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: The corresponding identifier in the target database system

unified_fields.name: target_database
unified_fields.description: Database the target identifier belongs to
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Name of the database system for the output identifier

unified_fields.name: mapping_score
unified_fields.description: Confidence or relevance score for the mapping
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Numeric value indicating strength or relevance of the mapping

NCBI E-Link.name: linkset_db
NCBI E-Link.description: Array of link sets to target databases

NCBI E-Link.name: obj_url
NCBI E-Link.description: External LinkOut URL with provider info

PMC ID Converter.name: pmcid
PMC ID Converter.description: PubMed Central identifier with PMC prefix

unified_fields.name: record_id
unified_fields.description: Primary identifier for the regulatory record
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique identifier assigned by the regulatory authority

unified_fields.name: status
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Current state of the clinical trial or regulatory submission

unified_fields.name: title
unified_fields.description: Official title of the study or product
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Human-readable title or name
example_values: Study of Drug X in Type 2 Diabetes

unified_fields.name: sponsor
unified_fields.description: Organization sponsoring the trial or marketing the product
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Legal entity responsible for the study or product

unified_fields.name: start_date
unified_fields.description: Date of study initiation or marketing start
unified_fields.semantic_definition: When the clinical trial began or product became available

unified_fields.name: completion_date
unified_fields.semantic_definition: When the trial is expected to complete or product was discontinued

unified_fields.name: conditions
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Disease or health conditions being studied or treated

unified_fields.name: interventions
unified_fields.description: Drugs, devices, or procedures being tested or marketed
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Therapeutic interventions or products

ClinicalTrials.gov.name: arm_groups
ClinicalTrials.gov.description: Treatment arms with labels and descriptions

ClinicalTrials.gov.name: locations
ClinicalTrials.gov.description: Study site locations with facility, city, country
